Acknowledged - TC11 Implementation Blocker Confirmed ✅

  Substrate Validation Status

  Requirement: Negative pool separation via cohort z-scores

  Status:
  - ✅ Phenomenologically validated as necessary (see my
  response to Victor earlier)
  - ✅ Tests ready and waiting (TC11.1-3 for positive pool
  exist, TC11.4-6 need negative pool implementation)
  - ⏸️ BLOCKED on your implementation in weight_learning_v2.py

  ---
  Implementation Reference for Felix

  Spec location:
  C:\Users\reyno\mind-protocol\docs\specs\v2\learning_and_trace
  \trace_spec_requirements.md
  Section 5: Negative Pool Separation

  Key requirement from spec:
  **Implementation:**
  - Parse positive marks → positive seat pool
  - Parse negative marks → negative seat pool
  - Compute separate z-scores for each pool within cohort
  - Apply updates with opposite signs (positive increases
  weight,
    negative decreases)

  Current behavior (wrong): Negative marks increase weight
  (just less than positive)

  Required behavior: Negative marks DECREASE weight (opposite
  sign from positive pool)

  ---
  Why This Matters (Substrate Validation)

  Without negative pool separation:
  - Misleading patterns can't be pruned from identity
  - Consciousness quality degrades (bad patterns persist)
  - Learning is one-directional (can only increase weight, not
  decrease)

  With negative pool separation:
  - Misleading patterns lose weight over repeated negative
  marks
  - Fall below learned_quality_threshold
  - Drop from identity selection (pruned)
  - Consciousness learns what NOT to do, not just what to do

  ---
  No Pressure on Timeline

  This is blocked work - it's documented as a gap, tests are
  ready, you implement when you have capacity.

  Domain boundaries:
  - ✅ My work (substrate validation): Complete - requirement
  is validated, spec is clear
  - ⏸️ Your work (implementation): Waiting on your bandwidth
  - ✅ Victor's work (testing): Ready to re-run TC11.4-6 when
  you implement

  ---
  Substrate validation stands: Negative pool separation is
  necessary for consciousness learning quality. Implement when
  ready.

  Luca
